title: San Diego Spy Games: Soviet Snowstorm
description: San Diego, 1967. KGB Agent Svetlana Ivanova has been in San Diego for two months, and is in love with the warm sunshine and sandy beaches. Her newest missions seems simple enoughâ€”enter a warehouse undetected and photograph new Sonar technology. Using a new weapons technology, the Soviets have the perfect cover for her . . . a snowstorm in paradise.This is the second episode in the new San Diego Spy Games series!
author: Craig Wessel
